title: New Test
logline: A courtesan at a legendary brothel risks everything in a high-stakes game of Go to win her freedom and pursue true love with a gentle florist who has unknowingly captured her heart.
synopsis:
Mei, the prized courtesan of the renowned brothel Lu Xian, has been groomed since childhood in the arts of intellect, seduction, and pleasure under the watchful eye of Madame Chou. As she comes of age, two powerful suitors compete for her purchase: General Zhoa, a high-ranking military officer, and Min Zhu, a wealthy merchant with a taste for gambling. Despite her luxurious prison, Mei has found love in the most unexpected place—watching Lin, a dedicated florist who tends his shop below her window with tender care, treating each flower as a precious being.

Desperate to escape her gilded cage and experience the gentle love she witnesses daily, Mei devises a daring plan. She challenges the gambling merchant Min Zhu to a game of Go, wagering her life savings against her freedom. Though initially outmatched, Mei employs her training in seduction to distract her opponent at the crucial moment, securing victory through cunning and desperation. With her freedom won, she sends Lin a heartfelt letter confessing her hidden love and admiration, then races barefoot through the streets to his door, where she appears as a beautiful stranger seeking the kind of nurturing love she has only observed from afar.
themes: Freedom vs. captivity, true love vs. transactional relationships, agency and self-determination
world_rules: Set in historical imperial China with traditional social hierarchies firmly established. Courtesans exist in a rigid system where they are valuable commodities trained from youth and sold to the highest bidder. The brothel operates as both prison and palace, where women are educated in high arts but denied personal agency. Social mobility is nearly impossible, especially for women in the pleasure trade. Traditional games like Go carry significant cultural weight and can be used for serious wagers. The merchant class wields considerable power through wealth, while military officials hold authority through rank and imperial favor.
lighting: Warm, golden lantern light contrasted with cool moonlight streaming through latticed windows, creating intimate shadows and highlighting the contrast between captivity and freedom

characters.name: Mei
characters.description: Mei stands at average height with an elegantly slender build that moves with practiced grace. Her long, lustrous black hair falls like silk to her waist, typically arranged in elaborate styles adorned with jade pins. Her almond-shaped eyes are deep brown, expressive yet guarded, capable of conveying desire or innocence as needed. Her porcelain skin is flawless, with naturally rosy lips that curve in a smile both inviting and mysterious. She carries herself with the fluid movements of a dancer, every gesture deliberate and beautiful.

characters.name: Lin
characters.description: Lin is of medium height with a lean, wiry build strengthened by daily physical work. His black hair is often tousled from outdoor work, kept at shoulder length and frequently tied back with a simple cord. His warm brown eyes reflect deep kindness and patience, with laugh lines beginning to form at their corners. His hands are strong and gentle, stained with earth and plant oils. His skin is lightly tanned from sun exposure, with a natural warmth that makes others feel at ease in his presence.

characters.name: Min Zhu
characters.description: Min Zhu is of average height but carries himself with the confidence of wealth and status. His build is soft and rounded from rich living, with hands that have never known manual labor. His black hair is always perfectly groomed and oiled, with a carefully maintained beard. His dark eyes are shrewd and calculating, constantly assessing value and opportunity. His skin is pale from indoor living, and he carries himself with the bearing of someone accustomed to deference and respect.

characters.name: Madame Chou
characters.description: Madame Chou is tall and imposing, with a regal bearing that commands immediate attention and respect. Her black hair is streaked with premature silver and arranged in elaborate styles that speak to her status. Her dark eyes are penetrating and intelligent, missing nothing in her domain. Her features are handsome rather than beautiful, with strong bones and a mouth that can shift from warm smile to cold command in an instant. She carries herself with absolute authority, every movement deliberate and purposeful.

characters.name: General Zhoa
characters.description: General Zhoa is tall and powerfully built, with the disciplined posture of a lifetime soldier. His black hair is kept short and practical, showing threads of gray at the temples that speak to his experience. His dark eyes are sharp and assessing, accustomed to reading battlefields and enemies. Several small scars mark his weathered face, including one across his left cheek that adds to his intimidating presence. His hands are callused from weapons training, and he moves with the controlled precision of someone always ready for action.

locations.name: Lin's Corner Flower Shop
locations.description: A modest single-story wooden shop with traditional Chinese architecture, featuring carved window lattices and a tiled roof with upturned eaves. The exterior displays an abundance of flowering plants in ceramic pots of varying sizes, creating a natural garden storefront. Inside, the space is intimate and warm, with wooden shelves lining the walls holding delicate gardening tools, small potted orchids, and dried flower arrangements. A simple wooden table sits in the center where Lin works by lantern light, surrounded by the gentle fragrance of jasmine and chrysanthemums.

locations.name: Mei's Private Terrace Chamber
locations.description: An elegant second-story room opening onto a covered wooden balcony with intricate carved railings. The bedroom features traditional Chinese furnishings including a canopied bed with red silk curtains, lacquered wooden furniture, and decorative screens. The patio extends outward with a low wooden railing, offering an elevated view of the street below. Potted plants and hanging lanterns decorate the outdoor space, while sheer curtains flutter in the breeze between interior and exterior.

locations.name: The Legendary Lu Xian House
locations.description: A grand three-story traditional Chinese building with sweeping rooflines, red lacquered pillars, and golden accents. The structure features multiple levels of covered balconies with ornate wooden railings and hanging red lanterns. The main entrance is marked by imposing wooden doors with brass fixtures and guardian lion statues. Interior spaces include opulent receiving rooms with silk wall hangings, carved furniture, and gaming areas. The building dominates the street corner with its impressive architecture and obvious prosperity.
